Structs/FeatureToggle.html#/s:12FeatureF.name: identifier
Structs/FeatureToggle.html#/s:12FeatureF.abstract: The identifier of the feature flag. Should be unique

Structs/FeatureToggle.html#/s:12FeatureF.name: isActive
Structs/FeatureToggle.html#/s:12FeatureF.abstract: Whether the feature flag is active or not.

Protocols/FeatureToggleRepository.html#/.name: retrieve(identifiable:)
Protocols/FeatureToggleRepository.html#/.abstract: retrieves a stored FeatureToggleRepresentable from the underlying store.

Protocols/FeatureToggleRepository.html#/.name: save(featureToggle:)
Protocols/FeatureToggleRepository.html#/.abstract: saves a supplied FeatureToggleRepresentable to the underlying store

Protocols/FeatureToggleIdentifiable.html.name: identifier
Protocols/FeatureToggleIdentifiable.html.abstract: The identifier of the feature flag. Should be unique

Protocols/FeatureToggleIdentifiable.html.name: fallbackValue
Protocols/FeatureToggleIdentifiable.html.abstract: The fallback value. Will be used if no information is given about whether the feature flag is active or not. This can happen for example if the CloudKit sync failed.

Protocols/FeatureToggleRepresentable.htm.name: identifier
Protocols/FeatureToggleRepresentable.htm.abstract: The identifier of the feature flag. Should be unique

Protocols/FeatureToggleRepresentable.htm.name: isActive
Protocols/FeatureToggleRepresentable.htm.abstract: Whether the feature flag is active or not.

Protocols/FeatureToggleApplicationServic.name: featureToggleRepository
Protocols/FeatureToggleApplicationServic.abstract: The repository to store the feature flags in

Protocols/FeatureToggleApplicationServic.name: register(application:)
Protocols/FeatureToggleApplicationServic.abstract: Register a UIApplication with the feature flag provider. This is used to retrieve the values on app launch at to update them in real time

Protocols/FeatureToggleApplicationServic.name: handleRemoteNotification(subscriptionID:completionHandler:)
Protocols/FeatureToggleApplicationServic.abstract: Register for remote notifications to update feature toggles in real time. This is needed because CloudKit will inform your app about databse changes via a silent push notification

Protocols/FeatureToggleRepository.html.name: FeatureToggleRepository
Protocols/FeatureToggleRepository.html.abstract: The repository caching all the available feature flags

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: onRecordsUpdated
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: The notification which is fired when a feature flag is created/updated/deleted

Extensions/Notification.html#/s:10Founda.name: featureTogglesUserInfoKey
Extensions/Notification.html#/s:10Founda.abstract: The userInfoKey in which the feature toggles are passed in the fired notification

Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.name: init(defaults:)
Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.abstract: Initialize the repository with some given UserDefaults. If nil a UserDefaults suite is created for you. If creation of the suite fails fallsback to UserDefaults.standard

Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.name: retrieve(identifiable:)
Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.abstract: Retrieve a feature flag from the repository

Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.name: save(featureToggle:)
Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.abstract: Save a feature flag to the repository

Classes/FeatureToggleApplicationService..name: register(application:)
Classes/FeatureToggleApplicationService..abstract: Register a UIApplication with the feature flag provider. This is used to retrieve the values on app launch at to update them in real time

Classes/FeatureToggleApplicationService..name: handleRemoteNotification(subscriptionID:completionHandler:)
Classes/FeatureToggleApplicationService..abstract: Register for remote notifications to update feature toggles in real time. This is needed because CloudKit will inform your app about databse changes via a silent push notification

Classes/FeatureToggleApplicationService..name: FeatureToggleApplicationService
Classes/FeatureToggleApplicationService..abstract: Concrete implementation of a feature flag provider

Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.name: FeatureToggleUserDefaultsRepository
Classes/FeatureToggleUserDefaultsReposit.abstract: Concrete implementation of a FeatureFlagRepository. Stores the feature flags in the UserDefaults.
